name: SOS Atlas
description: The Gorkrun are coming! Rise to the challenge and battle for control of procedurally generated planets in the uncharted deep space of the Norma region. With laser weapons or mechs, decimate the robotic scourge into circuit boards or take on your friends and draw first blood.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Core i3 2.4ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Core i5 2.8ghz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD R9 280 or equivalent Storage: 6 GB available space
